name: eneba-game
description: Eneba game offers monorepo â€“ API + Web

scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.test: npm --prefix api run test & npm --prefix web run test
scripts.lint: npm --prefix api run lint & npm --prefix web run lint
scripts.start: cd api && set NODE_ENV=production&& node src/index.js
